name: PREMASREE
briefDescription: Premasree, a free residential home for blind and visually impaired children began its operation as a registered trust in December 2012.The organization is founded by Mr. Biju Nair and is based in the scenic village of Jagulgachi in Ghatakpukur, 24 Parganas (S), West Bengal built on a land area of One Lakh Sq.ft. Our Vision and Mission is to promote a sustainable model of economic and academic opportunity to lesser privileged, Blind and Visually Impaired children for their overall development and help them gain equal rights in society, having achieved a threefold independence -physical, psychological and financial - to the best of their abilities. At present, Premasree comprises of 30 Blind children and 15 teaching and non-teaching staff.

address: City Centre DC Block Salt Lake Sector
